article_text: Dear Abby: My wife and I will be legally divorced within a few weeks. We have a year-old son. Although we have been separated for eight months, she is an awesome mother to our son. A man could not ask for a better lady to care for his child. We don’t talk about much other than our son. We are no longer in love, but I can honestly say I love her for who she is — the mother of my child.

article_metadata.title: Dear Abby: Dad getting divorce applauds mom’s devotion to their son | Miami Herald

article_summary:
We have a year-old son.
We are no longer in love, but I can honestly say I love her for who she is — the mother of my child.
Although we have been separated for eight months, she is an awesome mother to our son.
Dear Abby: My wife and I will be legally divorced within a few weeks.
A man could not ask for a better lady to care for his child.
